name: Lost Planet: Trag Zero
description: Explore the lost planet before the events of the best selling console game in LOST PLANET: TRAG ZERO. Battle snow pirates and deadly Akrid as you try to unlock a mysterious conspiracy that threatens all life on the snow planet. Arm yourself with numerous weapons and unleash the power of the mechanized Vital Suites against hordes of enemies. Just remember, that the only thing more dangerous than the inhabitants is the planet itself!
